verses_data.hebrew: וַיְמַ֤ן יְהֹוָה֙ דָּ֣ג גָּד֔וֹל לִבְלֹ֖עַ אֶת־יוֹנָ֑ה וַיְהִ֤י יוֹנָה֙ בִּמְעֵ֣י הַדָּ֔ג שְׁלֹשָׁ֥ה יָמִ֖ים וּשְׁלֹשָׁ֥ה לֵילֽוֹת
verses_data.english:
GOD
 provided a huge fish to swallow Jonah; and Jonah remained in the fish’s belly three days and three nights.

verses_data.hebrew: וַיִּתְפַּלֵּ֣ל יוֹנָ֔ה אֶל־יְהֹוָ֖ה אֱלֹהָ֑יו מִמְּעֵ֖י הַדָּגָֽה
verses_data.english: Jonah prayed to the ETERNAL his God from the belly of the fish.

verses_data.hebrew: וַיֹּ֗אמֶר קָ֠רָ֠אתִי מִצָּ֥רָה לִ֛י אֶל־יְהֹוָ֖ה וַֽיַּעֲנֵ֑נִי מִבֶּ֧טֶן שְׁא֛וֹל שִׁוַּ֖עְתִּי שָׁמַ֥עְתָּ קוֹלִֽי
verses_data.english: He said: In my trouble I called to  GOD, Who answered me; From the belly of Sheol I cried out, And You heard my voice.

verses_data.hebrew: וַתַּשְׁלִיכֵ֤נִי מְצוּלָה֙ בִּלְבַ֣ב יַמִּ֔ים וְנָהָ֖ר יְסֹבְבֵ֑נִי כׇּל־מִשְׁבָּרֶ֥יךָ וְגַלֶּ֖יךָ עָלַ֥י עָבָֽרוּ
verses_data.english: You cast me into the depths, Into the heart of the sea, The floods engulfed me; All Your breakers and billows Swept over me.

verses_data.hebrew: וַאֲנִ֣י אָמַ֔רְתִּי נִגְרַ֖שְׁתִּי מִנֶּ֣גֶד עֵינֶ֑יךָ אַ֚ךְ אוֹסִ֣יף לְהַבִּ֔יט אֶל־הֵיכַ֖ל קׇדְשֶֽׁךָ
verses_data.english: I thought I was driven away Out of Your sight: Would I ever gaze again Upon Your holy temple?

verses_data.hebrew: אֲפָפ֤וּנִי מַ֙יִם֙ עַד־נֶ֔פֶשׁ תְּה֖וֹם יְסֹבְבֵ֑נִי ס֖וּף חָב֥וּשׁ לְרֹאשִֽׁי
verses_data.english: The waters closed in over me, The deep engulfed me. Weeds twined around my head.

verses_data.hebrew: לְקִצְבֵ֤י הָרִים֙ יָרַ֔דְתִּי הָאָ֛רֶץ בְּרִחֶ֥יהָ בַעֲדִ֖י לְעוֹלָ֑ם וַתַּ֧עַל מִשַּׁ֛חַת חַיַּ֖י יְהֹוָ֥ה אֱלֹהָֽי
verses_data.english: I sank to the base of the mountains; The bars of the earth closed upon me forever. Yet You brought my life up from the pit, My  ETERNAL God!

verses_data.hebrew: בְּהִתְעַטֵּ֤ף עָלַי֙ נַפְשִׁ֔י אֶת־יְהֹוָ֖ה זָכָ֑רְתִּי וַתָּב֤וֹא אֵלֶ֙יךָ֙ תְּפִלָּתִ֔י אֶל־הֵיכַ֖ל קׇדְשֶֽׁךָ
verses_data.english: When my life was ebbing away, I called  GOD to mind; And my prayer came before You, Into Your holy temple.
They who cling to empty folly Forsake their own welfare,

verses_data.hebrew: וַאֲנִ֗י בְּק֤וֹל תּוֹדָה֙ אֶזְבְּחָה־לָּ֔ךְ אֲשֶׁ֥ר נָדַ֖רְתִּי אֲשַׁלֵּ֑מָה יְשׁוּעָ֖תָה לַיהֹוָֽה {פ}
verses_data.english: But I, with loud thanksgiving, Will sacrifice to You; What I have vowed I will perform. Deliverance is  GOD’s!

GOD
 commanded the fish, and it spewed Jonah out upon dry land.
